title: ICE with associated types defaults

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-associated-items
labels.description: Area: Associated items such as associated types and consts.

body:
Associated types defaults ( #19476 ) cause at least two different ICE with rustc 1.0.0-nightly (b4c965ee8 2015-03-02) (built 2015-03-03)

Case 1 : building : 

``` rust
trait Foo { type T; }
trait Bar {
    type Foo: Foo;
    type FooT = <<Self as Bar>::Foo as Foo>::T;
}
```

Case 2 : ICE 

``` rust
trait Foo { type T; }
trait Bar {
    type Foo: Foo;
    type FooT = <<Self>::Foo>::T;
}
```

backtrace : 

```
  1:     0x7f9849be3baf - sys::backtrace::write::hbe65ff4402631268QyA
   2:     0x7f9849c0c6e2 - panicking::on_panic::h245e35885d5e01ccFDJ
```

Case 3 : ICE

``` rust
trait Foo { type T; }
trait Bar {
    type Foo: Foo;
    type FooT = Self::Foo::T;
}
```

backtrace :
